body:
Previous package version didn't select proper optimization for CPUs with AVX512. This PR adds auto-selection of AVX-512 optimization for some supported CPUs (tested on skylake-x, newer CPU should work too).

Also added  2.15a1 version with implement another AVX512 optimization algorithm. This gives about 2.5 times performance improvement other generic build (i.e. previous spack install namd%intel)



-Nikolay
title: namd: Added optimization auto-selection for AVX512
